message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I understand you want a larger share, how about a 55/45 split in your favor?
I'll compromise a bit, 58-42 is my new offer

This is getting ridiculous. A 50/50 split is the only fair option. Take it or leave it.
